entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulation 2 to 5 inches valley floors, 4 to 8 inches benches, Uinta County, and Wasatch Back, except up to 12 inches Park City. * WHERE...In Utah, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 1:25PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong winds near Casper today and tonight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Southwest wind with gusts over 50 mph possible at times. * WHERE...Casper, especially along Outer Drive. * WHEN...This afternoon through tonight.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 1:16PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THURSDAY TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Southwest winds gusting as high as 55 MPH. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From 11 PM Thursday to 5 PM MST Friday.
